explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the application of transformers and attention-based networks in quantitative trading, which are part of machine learning techniques.
explanations.deep learning: Transformers and attention-based networks are deep learning architectures, and the paper surveys their applications in quantitative finance.
explanations.neural network: The paper focuses on transformer neural network architecture and other attention-based networks.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper explicitly mentions attention mechanisms as a building block of transformers and discusses their applications in quantitative finance.
explanations.Large Language Model: The paper references the rise of Large Language Models as an example of transformer applications in natural language processing.
explanations.LLM: LLM is an abbreviation for Large Language Model, which is mentioned in the paper.
